name: MyPiggyBank
0:
”Alexa, open my piggy bank”
”Alexa ask my piggy bank to set a saving goal of thousand dollars”
”Alexa, ask my piggy bank to add ten dollars to my savings”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my piggy bank
des:
This skill will help you set a saving goal and tracks it for you. You can set yourself a saving goal by saying "Alexa, ask my piggy bank to set a saving goal of $1000".
Each day when you save some money, all you need to do is just tell "Alexa, ask my piggy bank to add $10 to my savings" and Alexa will keep adding to your account.
Do you want to know how far are you from your savings?
-Just ask Alexa, open my piggy bank

You can also Reset your saving Goal by saying "Rest my goal" at anytime.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
